    #include <bits/stdc++.h>
    using namespace std;
    #define gi(x) scanf("%d",&x)
    int main(){
    string s;
    char a;
    int b=-1;
    cin>>s;
    int n=s.length();
    char pre=s[0];
    for(int i=0;i<n;){
    int cnt=0;
    while(i<n && s[i]==pre){
    cnt++;
    i++;
    }
    if(cnt>=b){
    if(cnt==b){
    if(pre<a)
    a=pre;
     
    }
    else{
    a=pre;
    b=cnt;
     
    }
    }
    if(i<n){
    pre=s[i];
    }
    }
    printf("%c\n",a);
    printf("%d\n",b);
     
    }
